ogDescription: i say there's no such thing as failure. failure is just a mistake trying to move you in a better direction. #mondaymotivation

card_1.cardText:
> “_I say there’s no such thing as failure. Failure is just a mistake trying to move you in a better direction._”

Oprah Winfrey

card_10.cardText:
Oprah delivered a speech in South Africa honoring the 100th anniversary of Nelson Mandela's birth. Mandela, the anti-apartheid leader spent 27 years in prison before becoming South Africa's first democratically elected president and its first black president in 1994.

[view sources](https://smarthernews.com/18-12-3-qtd-oprah/)

body:
• Oprah Offers Rousing Tribute to Mandela in S. Africa Visit:
